Name: Smoke & Mirrors (by The Bon Vivants)
Ingredients: 15 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Genever and mezcal sit surprisingly well together in this very refreshing drink with mint and lemon.
History: Created in 2016 by The Bon Vivants, USA for Rutte Old Simon Genever.
